behavioural_insights: Consistently uses informal, direct, concise, and casual tone across all messages
Prefers quick, prompt responses and spontaneous plans with friends
Frequently uses humor and gaming references to lighten conversation

Demonstrates a preference for role‑play or mock interview practice to build confidence
Often references specific times or dates (e.g., 8:30, 10 AM, Saturday) indicating a need for scheduling precision

Frustrated or annoyed when expectations are unmet or when micromanagement occurs
Excited and positive when discussing new food, sports moments, or upcoming events
Disappointed when friends miss commitments or when events are canceled
Hopeful and hopeful when planning future activities
